welcome_message_body: Welcome to Vantaa, Finland! Get ready to experience the charming blend of nature, culture, and history that this city is known for. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything Vantaa has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: China Man
restaurants.description: China Man is a chinese restaurant located in Helsinki.

restaurants.name: Pizzarium
restaurants.description: Pizzarium is a pizzeria located in Vantaa.

restaurants.name: Kahvila-Ravintola Wanha Pehtoori
restaurants.description: Kahvila-Ravintola Wanha Pehtoori is a restaurant located in Helsinki.

restaurants.name: Ravintola Makalu
restaurants.description: Ravintola Makalu is a himalayan restaurant located in Helsinki.

restaurants.name: Rönttösrouva
restaurants.description: Rönttösrouva is a bakery located in Helsinki.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Helsinki-vantaa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Helsinki-vantaa Airport, primarily serving low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Helsinki-malmi Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Helsinki-malmi Airport, used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
